price: (17) Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
